<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EC = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/fs/#a5f126cc7b64d31cd709215b48656d83d">sys::fs::status</a>(TimestampFile, FileStatus)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Policy.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/cachepruningpolicy/#a26f65d4efd088dd6f035a970ef350628">Interval</a>)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Policy.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/cachepruningpolicy/#a26f65d4efd088dd6f035a970ef350628">Interval</a> != seconds(0)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check whether the time stamp is older than our pruning interval.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If not, do nothing.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TimeStampModTime = FileStatus.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/fs/basic-file-status/#ae807b50b0b414d8a9195cdc0ee23b86a">getLastModificationTime</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TimeStampAge = CurrentTime - TimeStampModTime;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (TimeStampAge &lt;= &#42;Policy.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/cachepruningpolicy/#a26f65d4efd088dd6f035a970ef350628">Interval</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Timestamp file too recent (&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">                          &lt;&lt; duration&#95;cast&lt;seconds&gt;(TimeStampAge).<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab1772fd431decccb7926d484ea223db7">count</a>()</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Write a new timestamp file so that nobody else attempts to prune.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There is a benign race condition here, if two processes happen to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// notice at the same time that the timestamp is out-of-date.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="#ab9f0418e712e930d9aa516ac08860491">writeTimestampFile</a>(TimestampFile);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Keep track of files to delete to get below the size limit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Order by time of last use so that recently used files are preserved.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::set&lt;FileInfo&gt; FileInfos;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t TotalSize = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Walk the entire directory cache, looking for unused files.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::error&#95;code EC;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallstring">SmallString&lt;128&gt;</a> CachePathNative;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#a58cfd8a47c0ef96db27b451c2d6ec49fa8e5f3adee38c8fccc13c1f3be0143796">sys::path::native</a>(Path, CachePathNative);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Walk all of the files within this directory.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/fs/directory-iterator">sys::fs::directory&#95;iterator</a> File(CachePathNative, EC), FileEnd;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlight">       File != FileEnd &amp;&amp; !EC; File.increment(EC)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ignore filenames not beginning with &quot;llvmcache-&quot; or &quot;Thin-&quot;. This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// includes the timestamp file as well as any files created by the user.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This acts as a safeguard against data loss if the user specifies the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// wrong directory as their cache directory.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> filename = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#aa56d25bb5127dd7a5831c25764f76cbe">sys::path::filename</a>(File-&gt;path());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!filename.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a2cd8968ff703aaeb395dcd63f6805ff1">starts&#95;with</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;llvmcache-&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &amp;&amp; !filename.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a2cd8968ff703aaeb395dcd63f6805ff1">starts&#95;with</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Thin-&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Look at this file. If we can&#39;t stat it, there&#39;s nothing interesting</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// there.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/erroror">ErrorOr&lt;sys::fs::basic&#95;file&#95;status&gt;</a> StatusOrErr = File-&gt;status();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!StatusOrErr) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the file hasn&#39;t been used recently enough, delete it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FileAccessTime = StatusOrErr-&gt;getLastAccessedTime();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Leave it here for now, but add it to the list of size-based pruning.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlight">    TotalSize += StatusOrErr-&gt;getSize();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlight">    FileInfos.insert(&#123;FileAccessTime, StatusOrErr-&gt;getSize(), File-&gt;path()&#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumFiles = FileInfos.size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RemoveCacheFile = &#91;&amp;&#93;() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Remove the file.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/fs/#a921e0b01f22f9a37012450f9b5f0ccb7">sys::fs::remove</a>(FileInfo-&gt;Path);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Update size</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NumFiles--;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; - Remove &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; FileInfo-&gt;Path &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; (size &quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;%\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ++FileInfo;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// files.size() is greater the number of inputs  by one. However, a timestamp</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// file is created and stored in the cache directory if --thinlto-cache-policy</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// option is used. Therefore, files.size() is used as ActualNums.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Policy.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/cachepruningpolicy/#a0b73cd4206ae3e5edc07c24afb2057ac">MaxSizeFiles</a> &amp;&amp; ActualNums &gt; Policy.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/cachepruningpolicy/#a0b73cd4206ae3e5edc07c24afb2057ac">MaxSizeFiles</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/withcolor/#a237ad6eae22f6b2746a542c02d309a5b">WithColor::warning</a>()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;ThinLTO cache pruning happens since the number of created files (&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Prune for size now if needed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Policy.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/cachepruningpolicy/#ac13a6c169c6b44529d9f6bae76c8b4ed">MaxSizePercentageOfAvailableSpace</a> &gt; 0 || Policy.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/cachepruningpolicy/#a8c514fa2ef23ee2f092cedf2691886dd">MaxSizeBytes</a> &gt; 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ErrOrSpaceInfo = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/fs/#aa6e76a61d9d7f11a082b6e8665c03dab">sys::fs::disk&#95;space</a>(Path);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!ErrOrSpaceInfo) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7f2a3d4dcfee70225988aec53ff1e173">report&#95;fatal&#95;error</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Can&#39;t get available size&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sys/fs/space-info">sys::fs::space&#95;info</a> SpaceInfo = ErrOrSpaceInfo.get();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AvailableSpace = TotalSize + SpaceInfo.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sys/fs/space-info/#a64d6950ffda5357afe511fea80360427">free</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Policy.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/cachepruningpolicy/#ac13a6c169c6b44529d9f6bae76c8b4ed">MaxSizePercentageOfAvailableSpace</a> == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Policy.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/cachepruningpolicy/#ac13a6c169c6b44529d9f6bae76c8b4ed">MaxSizePercentageOfAvailableSpace</a> = 100;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Policy.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/cachepruningpolicy/#a8c514fa2ef23ee2f092cedf2691886dd">MaxSizeBytes</a> == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Policy.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/cachepruningpolicy/#a8c514fa2ef23ee2f092cedf2691886dd">MaxSizeBytes</a> = AvailableSpace;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TotalSizeTarget = std::min&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><span class="doxyHighlight">        AvailableSpace &#42; Policy.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/cachepruningpolicy/#ac13a6c169c6b44529d9f6bae76c8b4ed">MaxSizePercentageOfAvailableSpace</a> / 100ull,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Policy.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/cachepruningpolicy/#a8c514fa2ef23ee2f092cedf2691886dd">MaxSizeBytes</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Occupancy: &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; ((100 &#42; TotalSize) / AvailableSpace)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;% target is: &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      &lt;&lt; Policy.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/cachepruningpolicy/#ac13a6c169c6b44529d9f6bae76c8b4ed">MaxSizePercentageOfAvailableSpace</a> &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;%, &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      &lt;&lt; Policy.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/cachepruningpolicy/#a8c514fa2ef23ee2f092cedf2691886dd">MaxSizeBytes</a> &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; bytes\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ActualSizes = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;File : Files)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (File)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ActualSizes += File-&gt;getBufferSize();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ActualSizes &gt; TotalSizeTarget)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/withcolor/#a237ad6eae22f6b2746a542c02d309a5b">WithColor::warning</a>()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;ThinLTO cache pruning happens since the total size of the cache &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><span class="doxyHighlight">             </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;files consumed by the current link job (&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &lt;&lt; ActualSizes &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;  bytes) exceeds maximum cache size (&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &lt;&lt; TotalSizeTarget</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; bytes); consider adjusting --thinlto-cache-policy\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Remove the oldest accessed files first, till we get below the threshold.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (TotalSize &gt; TotalSizeTarget &amp;&amp; FileInfo != FileInfos.end())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><span class="doxyHighlight">      RemoveCacheFile();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
